HTMLMenuElement.summary:
The HTMLMenuElement interface provides additional properties (beyond those inherited from the interface) for manipulating a {{HTMLElement("menu")}} element.
<menu> is a semantic alternative to the ul element.

HTMLMenuElementCompact.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The compact property of the interface indicates that spacing between list items should be reduced. The exact handling of the compact attribute is browser-specific. Instead of using this property, consider using CSS line-height instead.

remarks.para: It reflects the compact attribute of the menu element.
